item.title: NAT Troubles or how my ISP screwed me over
item.description: Couple of days ago, I woke with my inbox filled with alerts from my monitoring service, the dashboard was lit up like a Christmas tree. I’m not new to having downtimes, but this was the most unusual one: the servers were alright, the internet connection was fine, but the services were inaccessible. I had a bad feeling about this one. You see, most of my internet presence comes out of my bedroom.
